name: Twine Workshop 2
description:
This is a Twine Game made for a Writing Workshop with the Video Game Development Club at UCI.  This game goes over some cool functionalities of Harlowe 2.1.0 in Twine. 

  • Text Colors and changing the Style of a Twine Game
  • Arrays and Datamaps
  • Pop-ups

The Game is playable and tries to demonstrate the concepts in action, while the code contains comments meant to help give some context and additional points. It's a bit of a dry read, but hopefully it's helpful.

There are probably more efficient ways to program the game, but this is meant to illustrate one method as I would do it.
